summary: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.
cast: Milla Jovovich|Ali Larter|Kim Coates|Shawn Roberts|Sergio Peris-Mencheta|Spencer Locke|Boris Kodjoe|Wentworth Miller|Sienna Guillory|Kacey Clarke|Norman Yeung|Fulvio Cecere|Raymond Olubawale|Christopher Kano|Tatsuya Goke|Nobuya Shimamoto|Peter Kosaka|Denis Akiyama|Kenta William Tomeoki|Shin Kawai|Mika Nakashima|Takato Yamashita|Hiromi Okuyama|Bill Blair|Martin Crewes|K.J. Duffey|Jamie Ferenczi|Stefen Hayes|Brian Jansen|Azmyth Kaminski|Evin Michaels|Devon Richards|Valerie Ruescas|Jay Yoo
title: Resident Evil: Ultratumba
